ch.unige.ng.ops.crossover
Interface Crossover<T extends GlobalIndividual>

All Superinterfaces:
Operator<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicOnePointCrossOver, DisruptiveCrossover, DoubleOffspringCrossOver, MeanCrossover, SingleOffspringCrossover, SubListSGPCO, SubTreeCrossover, SwapCrossover, TwoPointsCrossover, UniformCrossover, VarSizeOnePointCrossOver
public interface Crossover<T extends GlobalIndividual>
extends Operator<T>

This interface forces a method that is a crossover to create a new individual given two parents.

Version:
2 juin 2005
Author:
Jacques Fontignie

Method Summary
 T crossover(T mate1, T mate2, Context context)
          This method makes a crossover between two mates, only one offspring is created, classes that generate more than one have to select one randomly from the list.
 
Methods inherited from interface ch.unige.ng.ops.Operator
operate, operate
 

Method Detail

crossover

T crossover(T mate1,
            T mate2,
            Context context)
This method makes a crossover between two mates, only one offspring is created, classes that generate more than one have to select one randomly from the list.

Parameters:
mate1 -
mate2 -
context -
Returns:
an individual that is the child of mate1 and mate2, only one individual has to be created
